product.name: Sweet Home Collection 2 Piece Window Curtain Panel Set with Unique Stylish Pinch Pleat Pintuck Design
product.description: Decorate with uncompromising sophistication. The Hudson Pin tuck Window Curtain Panel Pair will brighten your space with luxurious, crisp white fabric and classic pin-tuck patterns. Subtle pin-tucks add life and motion to the luxurious fabric by pulling the into a barely-there diamond pattern. The geometric element is so simple and effective without excessive embellishment. Keep your style clean, classic, and effortlessly cool, just like you.
product.bullet_points:
• Made of 100% Brushed Microfiber that is super soft and exceeds style and comfort expectations
• Each panel has 6 durable chrome metal grommets that measure 1.5" which fit most curtain rods
• Each panel measures 84" long by 38" wide for a combined total dimension of 84" x 76"
• These curtains feature a unique design that will spruce up your kitchen, bedroom, or any room in your home. Match with other items from our pinch pleat collection for a unique fashionable look!
• Care Instructions: Machine wash in cold water with similar colors.
